mapper.select: SELECT pharmacy_admin_id as pharmacyId, person_id as personId, subsidiary_id as subsidiaryId, email as email, user_name as userName, password as password FROM pharmacy_admin WHERE email = #{email} and status = 1
SELECT admin_id as adminId, person_id as personId, email as email, user_name as userName, password as password FROM admin WHERE email = #{email} and status = 1

SELECT client_id as clientId, person_id as personId, address_id as addressId, email as email, user_name as userName, password as password, birthdate as birthdate FROM client WHERE email = #{email} and status = 1
